artist: Georg Baselitz (born Hans-Georg Kern); Publisher: Paragon Press, London
life_date: Georg Baselitz (born Hans-Georg Kern), German, born 1938; Paragon Press, London, Publisher
medium: Woodcut printed in green, with hand-applied watercolor

title: Der Hirte (The Herder)
